errors.error_description: The link to the license file incorrectly points to `LICENSE.md`, which does not exist in the repository; the correct file is `LICENSE.rst`.
correction_candidates: Correct the link to point to the `LICENSE.rst` file.
The license file is located in the `docs` directory, so the path should be `docs/LICENSE.rst`.
The license file is named `COPYING`, not `LICENSE.md`.
Remove the link and rely on the text description of the license.
errors.golden_answer: Correct the link to point to the `LICENSE.rst` file.
